bio: Manik Miah, the head culinary specialist from the Windsor Tiffin eatery in Burbage, contributed in the finals of the Curry Chef of the Year competition sorted out by the Bangladesh Caterers Association. The test saw 30 culinary specialists from over the UK showcased their aptitudes at Northampton College by making a mark dish in only 45 minutes.
